name: NYDailyNews
text:
A statue of Melania Trump in Slovenia was torched on July 4, Reuters reported.

The statue previously stood near the First Lady’s hometown of Sevnica.

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A man shown on video being held in an illegal police chokehold is in trouble with the law.

He has been hit with hate crime robbery and assault charges for attacking a gay couple in the Bronx, officials said .
